onMarkerReached(android.media.AudioTrack.Description: Called on the listener to notify it that the previously set marker has been reached by the playback head.

onPeriodicNotification(android.media.Aud.Description: Called on the listener to periodically notify it that the playback head has reached a multiple of the notification period.

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the playback head position of an AudioTrack has reached a notification marker or has increased by a certain period.
